reviewText: Badly dated, dreadful script, wooden acting, ridiculous ending.  A friend recommended this, so I watched the entire movie, but I would suggest giving this one a pass unless you are diehard fans of the stars and want to see them in their early films.

My father always talked about this hysterical turn Monty Woolley did as Santa, but couldn't remember anything about the film. I finally found the film after years of searching and was thrilled...until I watched it. The Santa bit isn't that funny, happens in the first five minutes, and the rest of the film, despite the cast? Eesh!
Monty Woolley being annoying, frustrating, uncooperative, but at the end showing he has a heart. But holding out to the very end.
